description: large boulders at center; three men working with drafting tools at large table at right; rectangle of landscape with small mountains with surveyor, two pairs of figures flaking a bridge and another surveyor with figures holding an umbrella and vertical measuring sticks
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Edition on back, in pencil: [Picturing Power \"Wherein one,
title: Wherein one, in the name of knowledge, measures everything, gives it a name and publicises this, thereby claiming it
